```{r}
library(ape)
library(mlesky)
alphaFun=function(x){if (x<2000) 0.1 else 10}
t=simCoal(1990:2020,alphaFun)
plotBoth(t,alphaFun)
```



```{r}
fit=mlsky(t)
plot(fit)
```
